endpoint_test module

endpoint_test.check_endpoint(base_url: str, endpoint: str) → str | None[source]

Checks if each endpoint in a list is valid with Ragflow’s server returning code 0.

Parameters:

  • base_url (param) – The base URL of your RAGFlow service (e.g., “http://localhost:8000”)

  • endpoint (str) – Endpoint paths (e.g., “/api/v1/ragflow”, “/health”])

Returns:

str if the endpoint in active with Ragflow’s server returning code = 0 None if otherwise.

Note: both cases return HTTP 200.

Return type:

str | None

endpoint_test.test_login_endpoint()[source]

Test fucntion to test ragflow’s “/v1/user/login” endpoint accessed by grpc_async_server_ragserve.py.

endpoint_test.test_new_token_endpoint()[source]

Test fucntion to test ragflow’s “/v1/system/new_token” endpoint accessed by grpc_async_server_ragserve.py.

endpoint_test.test_register_endpoint()[source]

Test fucntion to test ragflow’s “/v1/user/register” endpoint accessed by grpc_async_server_ragserve.py.
